mapper.select: SELECT sComment.sCommentId as commentId, content, sComment.userId as userId, user.name as userName, user.headImgId as avatarURL, sComment.time as time FROM sComment,user WHERE sComment.fCommentId=#{fCommentId} AND sComment.userId=user.userId ORDER BY sComment.time LIMIT #{num},#{size}
SELECT COUNT(*) from sComment WHERE fCommentId=#{fCommentId}
